A very enjoyable puzzle game, the best feature for me, being the cooperative! 
Many hours of brain scratching fun to be had, trying to figure out puzzles. They get progressively harder and more complex as it proceeds on.  
When completed, all is not over! Infinite replayability in custom made maps  at steam workshop, or even easily make your own level with ingame editor. Simplstic and easy, yet lots of team play fun.

I had never experienced Portal but found this on sale.  It was different and amazing and really fun.  Took me a second to figure out that left button one portal, right button other portal.  Once you have that down, everything else is cake.  The two player section may be my favorite as it really makes you think.  Or rather try to outthink your partner and solve the puzzle first.
This game is awsum! :P

Despite Portal's incredible gameplay and incredible story, I would dare to argue Portal 2 is not just far better, but a mastery of what can be done with this concept. The fact that Valve usually don't make more than 2 of a franchise pretty much guarantees this is this is the last iteration Portal will see, so I am glad this game turned out as well as it did.
It is best to end with a bang.
First of all, the graphics had some touch-up from the last game, and the physics seem a bit more real-to-life(well, as real to life a game about portals can get). Second, the story of this game adds so many layers and questions upon what Portal had to offer, which keeps it just as interesting as its predecessor, if not more so. Finally, the inclusion of not only a level editor, but also a multiplayer mode and a much longer campaign make this game worth twice the price tag it's placed at. I would call it flawless(even the minute issue I had with the loadtimes was at least somewhat fixed).

Pros:
+Plenty of content this time around
+Interesting story which builds upon the plot of the original, leaving the player plenty of story questions to think about
+Lovable characters make a return, and the game introduces a great deal of new ones as well
+Level Editor with a bit of a learning curve, but is pretty easy to make basic stuff with
+New Multiplayer Mode
+Better graphics than the previous game
+Space Core. SPACE CORE. SPAAAAAACE CORE!

Cons:
-The fact that Space Core barely appeared :(

Rating:
10/10
this is a amazing game its so cool

Habre completado el juego no menos de 15 veces, y sigue sin aburrirme. La historia por si sola puede que sea algo coja, se enriquece muchisimo si completas el Portal 1 antes para entender ciertos puntos y tener una sensación completa de inmersión, pero por si sola es muy completa, con muchisimas horas de juego entre la historia, el cooperativo, las cámaras de la comunidad (algunas cámaras son endiabladamente complicadas), creación de tus propias cámaras... Recomendado 100%.
Love This Game Comes With Back Stories Too LOVE IT!

The Perpetual Testing Initiative is a great thing. All the User designed chambers are fun. I wish they would update the PTI to add more parts to use in the chambers. and maybe add some editable triggers that contain logics in them to be able to set complex input/output conditions. and maybe allow 1 of the 4 chamber themes to be selected.

Portal 2 is the epitome of an excellent puzzle game following a very interesting story. The graphics are amazing, the voice acting is incredible, and the story makes you feel like you're in the Aperture Science lab.
Потрясающая игра. Шедевр. 10 из 10.
Отличная игра.

Portal 2 is one of the most splendid and captivating sequels in videogaming history as it introduces a cast of dynamic new characters, a host of fresh puzzle elements, and a much larger set of devious test chambers.
Portal 2 is an improvement on what was already a tremendous game, the campaign is considerably longer, the visuals are wonderful, the soundtrack is magnificent and the gameplay is more exquisite.
Probably the best feature about Portal 2 is the 2 players cooperative experience featuring its own dedicated story, characters, and gameplay.
This game is a masterpiece and I highly recommend it as one of the best games I've ever player.

poral 

2

This game is a fun now co-operative game that has been improved by alot. You thought this was serious? Well ill give it in russian if you want it seriously. *pulls out russian keyboard*                                                                                                                                                     Эта игра сразу отталкивает тех, кто были знакомы с первым титулом, бросая обновленную версию движка Source в игре, которая дает четкую разрыв между, как вы контроля и что на самом деле на экране по сравнению с первой игрой.

ArtStyle в порядке. Обновленный взгляд из-порталы довольно бедными по сравнению с первой игрой, и только область игры, которые действительно выделялись визуально, что средняя часть игры я не буду, потому что спойлеры описать. Остальная часть игры страдает от слишком мало белого пространства, с которой, чтобы стрелять порталов. Вы должны пойти в одного игрока принимать тот факт, что вы не играете портал, первый платформер-головоломка человек, но Portal 2, первый человек приключенческая игра.

Чтобы перейти с новой роли в качестве игры приключенческая игра, голос направление действуя потерять все подобие мягкой робота тона от первой игры. Стивен Мерчант имеет почти никакого искажения применительно к его голосу, и HK Сценарий Симмонса буквально ничего, но разовых шуток, которые предотвращают игрока из правильного подключения с ним. Эллен Маклейн в порядке, ничего фантастического, но она должна пройти через тот же сценарий ила в качестве остальной части броска. Сценарий просто отстой, слишком много blantant попытки шуток, не хватает вне порядка или черный юмор которая помогла протянуть игру свою неповторимую атмосферу. Так много элементов из Portal 1, повторно, что вы удивляетесь, почему клапан надоело.
Eta igra srazu ottalkivayet tekh, kto byli znakomy s pervym titulom, brosaya obnovlennuyu versiyu dvizhka Source v igre, kotoraya dayet chetkuyu razryv mezhdu, kak vy kontrolya i chto na samom dele na ekrane po sravneniyu s pervoy igroy.

ArtStyle v poryadke. Obnovlennyy vzglyad iz-portaly dovol'no bednymi po sravneniyu s pervoy igroy, i tol'ko oblast' igry, kotoryye deystvitel'no vydelyalis' vizual'no, chto srednyaya chast' igry ya ne budu, potomu chto spoylery opisat'. Ostal'naya chast' igry stradayet ot slishkom malo belogo prostranstva, s kotoroy, chtoby strelyat' portalov. Vy dolzhny poyti v odnogo igroka prinimat' tot fakt, chto vy ne igrayete portal, pervyy platformer-golovolomka chelovek, no Portal 2, pervyy chelovek priklyuchencheskaya igra.

Chtoby pereyti s novoy roli v kachestve igry priklyuchencheskaya igra, golos napravleniye deystvuya poteryat' vse podobiye myagkoy robota tona ot pervoy igry. Stiven Merchant imeyet pochti nikakogo iskazheniya primenitel'no k yego golosu, i HK Stsenariy Simmonsa bukval'no nichego, no razovykh shutok, kotoryye predotvrashchayut igroka iz pravil'nogo podklyucheniya s nim. Ellen Makleyn v poryadke, nichego fantasticheskogo, no ona dolzhna proyti cherez tot zhe stsenariy ila v kachestve ostal'noy chasti broska. Stsenariy prosto otstoy, slishkom mnogo blantant popytki shutok, ne khvatayet vne poryadka ili chernyy yumor kotoraya pomogla protyanut' igru svoyu nepovtorimuyu atmosferu. Tak mnogo elementov iz Portal 1, povtorno, chto vy udivlyayetes', pochemu klapan nadoyelo.

그냥 적당히 생각하면서 진행하면 5~6시간 정도가 평균 플레이 타임으로 보임. 모든 fps게임의 스토리모드 특성상
(폴아웃같이 이리저리 돌아댕기면서 뻘짓하는 게임 제외) 본격적으로 해당 게임의 세계관과 메인 스토리가 개입하기 시작하는
순간부터는 끊었다 하면 몰입도가 확 떨어지기 때문에 가능하다면 처음부터 끝까지 쭉 한번에 몰아 해보기를 권한다.

본인은 군것질하고 예능보느라 켜놓고 시간낭비. 개인차가 있겠지만 전작과 마찬가지로 보스전이 제이이일 쉽다.
다른 미션들은 대부분 맵던져주고 조용히 해결하게 두는데 보스전의 경우 플레이어가 행동을 하면 즉각적으로 반응이 나와서
무반응이면 개무쓸모 잉여짓이고 반응있으면 아 이게 맞는구나 생각하고 하면 그만이다.

어느정도 진행하다가 막히고 그것을 클리어 했을때 손가락운동이랑 숨쉬기운동만 아는 뇌가 조금은 쓸모있음을 느끼게 된다.
This game is fun to play and has entertaining characters. Plus if you get it you can also get the two free fan made expansion Mel and Reloaded which are great in themselves.

O que posso dizer sobre Portal 2:

A historia do modo single ficou sensacional,
O modo historia do modo co-op ficou excelente,
O modo edição de fases ficou uma maravilha,
E por fim o jogo ficou uma obra de arte com suas referencias com as pessoas reais e suas conexoes com outros jogos da valve/steam.

Não apenas recomendo e sim falo para jogarem um bom jogo!!
If you like sci-fi and puzzles, this is a go.

I DID beat this game on Xbox, so don't let my Steam time be misleading.
Ah, this game.  Where do I start?
Honestly, I don't even need to write a review for this game.  It's so ridiculously good that it's gotten 98% positive reviews.  98%!  When was the last time you found a game like that?
One thing I would suggest: If you haven't played this game already, on some system, then you are one of the few souls left who hasn't met Valve very well.  If you are indeed that person, then wait until Christmas or summer (whichever's closest) for the Valve Complete Pack to go down to ten bucks.  Then buy that, and get every Valve game ever.  It will literally be the best ten dollars you ever spend.

GOODNESS WHERE DO I START. Ok, For a person who jumps at everything in games, THIS GAME IS AMAZING. The VOice acting in this is BEAUTIFUL. And the game affects are even better! The CO-OP Just adds to the fun. It's Enjoyable screaming at your friend over a microphone. This is by far one of Valve's best works. (Besides the Half life Series of course) I would recommend this game for those who enjoy taking it slow, and for those who love puzzles.

Portal 2... On ne le présente même plus. Jeu d'énigme à l'aide d'un créateur de Portails: Fantastiques. L'histoire fait donc suite au premier Volume, et est géniale. Tantôt amusé, tantôt désorienté, ce jeu nous traîne à travers son histoire, et ses casse-têtes qui deviennent de plus en plus durs au fur et à mesure que l'on avance dans le jeu. Et pour avoir encore plus de quoi faire un mode Co-op, et des maps Workshop !

Portal 2 — игра на один раз. Зато какой! Отточив перья и логику на первой части, Valve выпустила образцовый сиквел, к которому почти не придраться. Локации масштабнее и разнообразнее, графика — техничнее, повествование — глубже. Основа основ — по-прежнему пушка, создающая два взаимосвязанных портала, правда, механика стала гораздо сложнее. 

P.S. Советую всем

mi sono accorto di non aver mai recensito questo gioco, ma credo che ora sia arrivato il momento, dopo averlo finito due volte e aver giocato ad un sacco di test della comunità, posso felicemente affermare che questo è il mio gioco preferito di tutti i tempi... e ne ho giocati di giochi belli in vita mia.

[h1] PRO [/h1]

- storia semplice ma fantastica, capace di stupirti.
- molti momenti esilaranti.
- easter eggs (io adoro gli easter eggs)
- possibilità di creare le tue camere di test per poi condividerle con gli altri, e quindi giocare le camere degli altri
- quelli della valve sono stati così bravi da creare una specie di sequel, una storia a parte per la modalità coop. e quanto è       divertente la coop...
- sountrack FANTASTICA che è sincrtonizzata con le tue azioni nel gioco. certo la canzoni non sono il massimo ascoltate al difuori del gioco, ma dentro devo dire che sono veramente azzeccate.
- PUOI SPARARE DEI PORTALI, ceh io avrò usato almeno due ore a divertirmi con i portali, sperimentarli, fare cose assurde...
io odio davvero i giochi puzzle, ma la presenza della portalgun mi ha fatto divertire un sacco ( e anche le battutine del gioco)

ah, e non sono riuscito a trovare contro...
Прошёл дважды. *Первый раз вы можете догадаться где..

Portal 2 is a masterpiece, a work of art that you will love for its ingenious story pop-culture, references to logical puzzles and co-op multiplayer. Definitely a candidate for game of the year.
Portal is perfect. Portal 2 is not. It's something better than that. It's human: hot-blooded, silly, poignant, irreverent, base, ingenious and loving. It's never less than a pure video game, but it's often more, and it will no doubt stand as one of the best entertainments in any medium at the end of this year. It's a masterpiece.

People unfamiliar with the Portal series are perhaps better off starting with Portal, and then playing Portal 2 (both are recommended). People familiar with Portal have an easy choice here: if you liked Portal, you will definitely like this sequel as well. And no, it's not like movie sequels which are worse than the original: in this case the sequel is at least as good as the original without in any way feeling repetitive. Highly recommended.

small robot makes me follow him.
small robot takes me to a big robot.
big robot is angry at me.
big robot makes me do tests.
small robot stops me doing tests.
big robot trys to kill me.
small robot becomes big robot.
new big robot is angry at me.
new big robot makes old big robot into a potato robot.
new big robot makes me and potato robot fall down.
i do tests without potato robot.
i find potato robot.
potato robot makes me do tests. 
me and potato robot make it back up to the new big robot.
new big robot makes me do tests.
new big robot trys to kil me.
me and potato robot put new big robot in space.
potato robot becomes the big robot.
big robot is my new friend.
big robot takes me outside.
big robot gives me big cube.
big robot sings a song. 
11111111111111111111111111111111111/10 would robot again.
